reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful. The fabric thickness receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it's not see-through. Several customers mention the dress is a little see-through.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress, perfect for maternity photos
items.body: Very pretty! Not see through. Versatile fabrics- I wore in the summer and was fine, and would def wear in the winter w/ a coat. Read more
items.author: Kayla Lewis

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Poor craftsmanship
items.body: I wanted to love this dress. The little flowers were hanging off towards the top of most of them and kills the whole vibe of the dress. You either have to sew a stitch at the top or return it. Read more
items.author: eNewLikeNew

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Makeup on dress
items.body: Would have been very happy with the dress but, I received a used dress instead of a new one. The dress had concealer on both the inside and outside of the dress, and this dress was intended to use for maternity photos. So disappointed. Read more
items.author: Denisse

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dupe!
items.body: This dress fits perfectly, it’s flattering and an amazing dupe for more expensive options I saw online. You will need a slip underneath as it is a bit sheer, but the material and quality is comfortable and stretchy but looks amazing. Will definitely be ordering more from this brand! Read more
items.author: Fucci

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfecto para baby shower
items.body: Me encantó este vestido, lo usé para mi baby shower estando de 9 meses y me sentí muy cómoda y linda. El diseño es precioso y se adapta bien a la barriga. Lo único que me hubiese gustado es que fuera un poco más largo, pero igual se veía hermoso. ¡Recibí muchos halagos! Read more
items.author: Kapc

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars See through
items.body: A little see through and the material doesn’t look like the picture Read more
items.author: Liz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning dress for any occasion
items.body: I got married in May and was 8 months pregnant. I ordered a large for extra room. I absolutely loved how this dress fit, and I received so many compliments. I would absolutely recommend this dress to anyone. Read more
items.author: olivia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Material was amazing not see through and I felt so beautiful Read more
items.author: Anamaria Medina

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White, Blue, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
